title: Tarar offers condolences to anchorperson Fariha Idrees on mother’s passing
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 11 (APP):Federal Minister for Information and Broadcasting Attaullah Tarar, accompanied by Prime Minister’s Media Coordinator Badar Shehbaz, visited the residence of senior anchorperson Fariha Idrees to offer condolences on the passing of her mother.
Expressing heartfelt sympathy, both leaders conveyed their deep sorrow to Fariha Idrees and her family. Minister Tarar described the loss as “an irreparable one for the family,” and both he and Badar Shehbaz offered Fatiha for the departed soul.
They noted that the void left by her passing can never be filled and expressed solidarity with the bereaved family during this difficult time. Prayers were offered for the elevation of the deceased’s ranks, along with wishes for patience and strength for the family.
Principal Information Officer Mobashir Hassan was also present on the occasion.
